LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.label: Armor - Blunt
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.description: Armor against blunt damage like club attacks, rock falls, and explosions.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.label: Armor - Sharp
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, and animal bites.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.label: Armor - Heat
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.description: Armor against temperature-related damage like burns.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Electric.label: Armor - Electric
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Electric.description: Armor against electric damage like EMP pulses.
